name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 9,058 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 551,372, and grants you up to 10,733 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
